query:
-- Seed prompt templates
INSERT INTO prompt_templates (name, type, templateText, variables, isActive) VALUES
('Luxury Mood Board', 'mood', 'Create a sophisticated interior design mood board for a {{typology}} project in {{location}}. Style: {{style}}, Market tier: {{tier}}. Materials: premium {{materialLevel}} finishes. The mood should convey exclusivity, warmth, and refined taste. Include natural materials, soft lighting, and curated art pieces.', '["typology","location","style","tier","materialLevel"]', true),
('Contemporary Material Board', 'material_board', 'Generate a detailed material board showing {{materialCount}} key materials for a {{tier}} {{typology}} project. Style direction: {{style}}. Focus on textures, color harmony, and material pairings. Show marble, wood, metal, and fabric swatches arranged in a professional grid layout.', '["materialCount","tier","typology","style"]', true),
('Marketing Hero Image', 'hero', 'Create a photorealistic marketing hero image for a {{tier}} {{typology}} development in {{location}}. Show a stunning interior living space with {{style}} design aesthetic. Natural light streaming through floor-to-ceiling windows. High-end finishes and furniture. Aspirational lifestyle photography style.', '["tier","typology","location","style"]', true),
('Minimalist Mood', 'mood', 'Design a minimalist interior mood board for a {{typology}} space. Clean lines, neutral palette with {{accentColor}} accents. Japanese-inspired simplicity meets {{location}} luxury. Material level: {{materialLevel}}/5.', '["typology","accentColor","location","materialLevel"]', true),
('Industrial Chic Mood', 'mood', 'Create an industrial-chic mood board for a {{typology}} loft conversion. Exposed concrete, steel beams, reclaimed wood. Market tier: {{tier}}. Balance raw industrial elements with {{style}} comfort and warmth.', '["typology","tier","style"]', true);

-- Seed materials catalog
INSERT INTO materials_catalog (name, category, tier, typicalCostLow, typicalCostHigh, costUnit, leadTimeDays, leadTimeBand, regionAvailability, supplierName, notes, isActive) VALUES
('Calacatta Gold Marble', 'stone', 'ultra_luxury', 850.00, 1500.00, 'AED/sqm', 90, 'long', '["UAE","Italy","UK"]', 'Antolini', 'Premium Italian marble, book-matched slabs available', true),
('Statuario Venato Marble', 'stone', 'luxury', 550.00, 950.00, 'AED/sqm', 75, 'long', '["UAE","Italy"]', 'Margraf', 'White marble with grey veining', true),
('Crema Marfil Marble', 'stone', 'mid', 180.00, 350.00, 'AED/sqm', 45, 'medium', '["UAE","Spain","India"]', 'Various', 'Versatile cream-toned marble', true),
('European Oak Engineered', 'wood', 'premium', 280.00, 550.00, 'AED/sqm', 60, 'medium', '["UAE","Germany","Austria"]', 'Schotten & Hansen', 'Wide plank engineered oak, multiple finishes', true),
('American Walnut Solid', 'wood', 'luxury', 450.00, 800.00, 'AED/sqm', 90, 'long', '["UAE","USA"]', 'Havwoods', 'Rich dark tones, premium grain patterns', true),
('Porcelain Large Format', 'tile', 'mid', 120.00, 280.00, 'AED/sqm', 30, 'short', '["UAE","Spain","Italy"]', 'Porcelanosa', '120x120cm format, marble-look options', true),
('Handmade Zellige Tile', 'tile', 'premium', 350.00, 650.00, 'AED/sqm', 60, 'medium', '["UAE","Morocco"]', 'Emery et Cie', 'Artisanal Moroccan tiles, unique glazes', true),
('Brushed Brass Hardware', 'metal', 'luxury', 150.00, 400.00, 'AED/piece', 45, 'medium', '["UAE","Italy","UK"]', 'Armac Martin', 'Solid brass, hand-finished', true),
('Blackened Steel Cladding', 'metal', 'premium', 220.00, 450.00, 'AED/sqm', 30, 'short', '["UAE","Germany"]', 'SteelArt', 'Hot-rolled steel with patina finish', true),
('Belgian Linen Upholstery', 'fabric', 'luxury', 180.00, 380.00, 'AED/m', 45, 'medium', '["UAE","Belgium","UK"]', 'Libeco', 'Heavy-weight upholstery linen, 20+ colorways', true),
('Mohair Velvet', 'fabric', 'ultra_luxury', 450.00, 900.00, 'AED/m', 60, 'medium', '["UAE","Italy"]', 'Rubelli', 'Pure mohair, exceptional drape and luster', true),
('Venetian Plaster', 'paint', 'luxury', 280.00, 550.00, 'AED/sqm', 14, 'short', '["UAE","Italy"]', 'Viero', 'Multi-layer hand-applied finish', true),
('Low-E Double Glazing', 'glass', 'mid', 350.00, 600.00, 'AED/sqm', 30, 'short', '["UAE","Germany"]', 'Guardian Glass', 'Energy-efficient, UV protection', true),
('Decorative Acoustic Panel', 'wallpaper', 'premium', 200.00, 450.00, 'AED/sqm', 45, 'medium', '["UAE","Denmark"]', 'BuzziSpace', 'Felt-based acoustic panels, custom colors', true),
('Italian Pendant Light', 'lighting', 'luxury', 2500.00, 8000.00, 'AED/piece', 90, 'long', '["UAE","Italy"]', 'Flos', 'Designer pendant, multiple sizes', true),
('Custom Joinery Unit', 'furniture', 'luxury', 3500.00, 12000.00, 'AED/unit', 120, 'critical', '["UAE"]', 'Local Craftsman', 'Bespoke built-in cabinetry', true),
('Smart Home Panel', 'fixture', 'premium', 1200.00, 3500.00, 'AED/piece', 30, 'short', '["UAE","USA","Germany"]', 'Crestron', 'Touch panel for lighting/HVAC/AV control', true),
('Artisan Ceramic Vase', 'accessory', 'premium', 800.00, 2500.00, 'AED/piece', 45, 'medium', '["UAE","Japan","Denmark"]', 'Various', 'Hand-thrown ceramic, gallery quality', true);
